Empowering Farmers for a Better Tomorrow

By Krushi Gaurav | May 12, 2025

Exposure to Advanced Agriculture – Kirloskar Agri Expo

To connect farmers with innovation, we organized a visit to the Kirloskar Agriculture Expo, showcasing cutting-edge equipment, sustainable practices, and smart technologies. These visits open new possibilities for cost-effective farming.

Training Programs for Hands-On Learning

We run workshops in organic farming, pest control, and cropping techniques through interactive field demos and classroom training.

Animal Health Care Initiatives

Through our Animal Health Care Program, farmers receive veterinary aid, vaccinations, and nutritional guidance to enhance livestock wellbeing and reduce dairy loss.

Homemade Organic Fertilizers – A Step Towards Self-Sufficiency

We promote homemade organic fertilizers such as Jeevamrut and compost. Farmers are trained to prepare them using farm waste and local inputs to enhance soil health sustainably.

Vermicompost Pits – Waste to Wealth

Our mission supports the creation of vermicompost pits using earthworms to convert waste into rich compost—boosting productivity and reducing chemical dependency.

Solar Bee Trap & Weather Station – Smart Farming Tools

We're introducing solar bee traps for eco pest control and weather stations to help plan irrigation and harvest through real-time climate data.

From smart tools and organic techniques to skill-building, we support farmers at every level—making agriculture resilient, tech-savvy, and community-driven.
